pages.title: The Production Line
pages.text: Once you have high-tier seeds, your goal is $(2)Stability$().$(br2)You want every letter to be $(2)Dominant Homozygous (e.g., SS SS SS SS)$().$(br2)This gives the plant a 10% stat buff across the board, and the dominant modifier gene will crush the mutation rate, virtually "locking in" your perfect crop so it never degrades.

pages.title: The Laboratory
pages.text: When trying to discover new tiers, you want $(4)Volatility$().$(br2)Keep a field of $(4)Recessive Homozygous (e.g., ff ff ff ff)$() crops. They have terrible stats, but their genetic instability makes them mutate rapidly.$(br2)Once they mutate into a higher tier, cross them with your stable lines to purify the new gene!
